author: PlayStation
description:

Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is a dark fantasy action RPG coming to PlayStation®5 on April 17, 2025. Battle monsters across an expansive story, craft powerful upgrades, and explore this vast, ruined world before Entropy consumes it.

Add Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree to your wishlist today!

title: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Future Games Show Trailer | PS5 Games

A free public demo is available on the PlayStation Store. Save data from the demo can be transferred to the full version of the game!

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008894

The 90s hardcore mecha game, exclusive to Japan until now! 

Assault Suit Leynos 2 is finally making its way to the West, following in the footsteps of Assault Suit Leynos and Assault Suit Valken. Now upgraded with new features and quality-of-life improvements. Suit up and start the assault... again!

title: Assault Suit Leynos 2 Saturn Tribute - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012783

Wear the glove of Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and wield control over Drev’s strings, a Puppet magically bound to her. As they journey to return to the Frontstage above, they will retell forgotten stories, uncover shadowy secrets, and learn their fate is interwoven with the kingdom of theater itself.

Once Upon A Puppet will be available April 23.
Pre-Order now!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Once Upon A Puppet - Pre-Order Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/bleach-rebirth-of-souls/

The time has come to walk the path of the Soul Reaper. Let’s pray this won’t be our last meeting.

📖 Don the hakama of Ichigo Kurosaki and relive unforgettable moments of the Bleach manga series in story mode.
⚔️ Select your fighter from a cast of over 30 playable characters from the series’ 20-year history.
🆚Challenge your friends to intense 1v1 battles with local and online multiplayer support.

ACCEPT YOUR SOUL AND REVERSE FATE.
BLEACH Rebirth of Souls is available now on PlayStation.


BLEACH Rebirth of Souls DELUXE EDITION includes 1 week of Early Access, Season Pass, and additional Soul Crystals.

Upgrade to the ULTIMATE EDITION to also receive 5 THOUSAND-YEAR BLOOD WAR and 5 REBIRTH OF SOULS COSTUME SETS.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #BLEACH #RebirthofSouls #bleachros
title: Bleach Rebirth of Souls - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Learn more about the post-apocalyptic world of our upcoming sci-fi survival horror game - Cronos: The New Dawn in our first Dev Diary.  

Music: 
“Particle Wave” – composer: Garret Weyenberg 
“Tomorrow's War” – composers: Enrico Cacace/John H. Nixon 
“Cold War” – composers: Harel Tsemah/Itamar Carmel/Itay Steinberg/Or Kribos 
Published by: Universal Music Publishing

title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Dev Diary #1 - Deep Dive Into the World | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
I Hate This Place: The Game is an eerie isometric survival horror simply drenched and oozing in its distinct comic book style and vibe.

Inspired by the Eisner award-nominated comic book series created by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin, I Hate This Place: The Game plunges players deep into a supernatural world where the rules of reality come undone. In an all-new isometric survival horror experience, delivered in a striking visual style drenched in bold, vivid colours and retro ‘80s comic book aesthetics.

Players take on the role of Elena, whose fight for survival begins when she unwittingly awakens a malevolent force. Outmatched and hunted in a hostile world, players must think fast, manipulating their surroundings to even the odds against formidable foes, engaging in tense gunfights and melee combat that rewards ingenuity over brute force, all while crafting essential tools to survive the harsh and unforgiving wilderness long enough to reach safehouses before nightfall, with the d
title: I Hate This Place: The Game - Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games
